title: DND Character Creator Express
description: Application to automatically generate and save first-level Dungeons and Dragons characters. Uses Node, Express, Handlebars, PostgreSQL, and Momentjs
tech: Postgres, Express, Node.js, Axios, Bcrypt, JavaScript Client-sessions, deployed with Heroku, MVC file structure

title: Surprise Me-al
description: A user inputs a desired country/region and is given a random meal from that region. Or, the user may choose to receive a random meal from anywhere in the world. A user is given ingredients and directions for the meal, along with an image of the meal and a map of where it is from. A user may also choose to be given a random cocktail to go along with their meal.

title: Employee Directory
description: An app built with React that allows users to quickly access their employee contact information.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A fitness app that allows users to create, view and track daily workouts. The user is able to log multiple exercises in a given day and also go back and update the workout. The user may track the name, type, weight, sets, reps and duration of each exercise. Cardiovascular exercises show the distance traveled in miles.

title: Note Taker
description: This application can be used to write, save, and delete notes and uses an express backend and save and retrieve note data from a JSON file. Can be used to organize, update, and when done, delete notes when needed.

title: Weather-App
description: I built a weather dashboard that runs in the browser and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS. I used the OpenWeather API and Moment Once a city has been entered it will save as an option for the future as well as display the 5 day forecast.

title: Daily Planner
description: A calendar application that allows users to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Code Quiz
description: A timed multiple-choice quiz on JavaScript fundamentals.

title: Password Generator
description: A random password generator based on user-specified length and criteria.
